alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 18 at 6:19PM CDT until September 18 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LIPSCOMB AND NORTHEASTERN HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 618 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Glazier, or 6 miles east of Canadian, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Glazier and Lake Marvin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
